    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>15441</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">Sai come funzionano le Istituzioni Europee?</string>
            <string language="en">Do you know how European Institutions work?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Können Sie, europäische Anstalten arbeiten?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Savez-vous les établissements européens 
travaillent ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Você sabe as instituições européias 
trabalham?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ξέρετε πώς τα ευρωπαϊκά Όργανα εργάζονται;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Usted sabe las instituciones europeas trabajan?</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Questo LO aiuta ad insegnare come funziona il Consiglio dell'Unione Europea. E' composto da 10 domande a risposta multipla su: 1. l' importanza del Consiglio dell'Unione Europea 2. Durata della Presidenza 3. Riunioni del Consiglio 4. Rapporto fra il Consiglio dell'Unione Europea e ilParlamento Europeo 5. Emendamento dei trattati 6. Numero di voti attribuiti ai paesi 7. Percentuali 8. Numero dei voti assegnati 9. Meccanismo di voto 10. Pianificazione del Lavoro</string>
            <string language="en">This LO helps teaching how the Council of the EU works.  It is composed of 10 multiple-choice questions on:

1. Importance of the Council of the EU
2. Length of Presidency
3. Council meetings
4. Relationship between Council of the EU  and European Parliament
5. Amending treaties
6. Number of votes attributed to countries
7. Percentages
8. Number of cast votes
9. Voting mechanism
10. Work Planning</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">Maastricht</string>
            <string language="en">Maastricht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">Trattato</string>
            <string language="en">Treaty</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">Consiglio</string>
            <string language="en">Council</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="en">Parliament</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">Europa</string>
            <string language="en">Europe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">Cittadinanza</string>
            <string language="en">Citizenship</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">Presidenza</string>
            <string language="en">Presidence</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">Ministri</string>
            <string language="en">Ministers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">stati membri</string>
            <string language="en">Member states</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses NIEDRIGE Hilfen, die unterrichten, wie der Rat des 
EUS arbeitet. Es besteht aus 10 Mehrfachwahl Fragen on:1. 
Wert des Rates des EU2. Länge von Presidency3. Rat 
meetings4. Verhältnis zwischen Rat des EUS und europäischem 
Parliament5. Ändern von von treaties6. Zahl der Stimmen 
zugeschrieben countries7. Percentages8. Zahl geworfenen 
votes9. Wählendes mechanism10. Arbeit Planung</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce BASSES aides enseignant comment le Conseil de l'EU 
travaille. Il se compose de 10 questions on:1 de multiple-choix.
Importance du Conseil de l'EU2. Longueur de Presidency3. 
Le Conseil meetings4. Rapport entre le Conseil de l'EU et 
Parliament5 européen. Modification de treaties6. Nombre 
de voix attribuées à countries7. Percentages8. Nombre de
votes9 moulé. Mechanism10 de vote. Planification de 
Travail</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este ajudas BAIXAS que ensinam como o conselho do EU 
trabalha. É composto de 10 perguntas on:1 da múltiplo-escolha.
Importância do conselho do EU2. Comprimento de 
Presidency3. Conselho meetings4. Relacionamento entre o 
conselho do EU e Parliament5 europeu. Emendando treaties6. 
Número dos votos atribuídos a countries7. Percentages8. 
Número de votes9 moldado. Mechanism10 votando. 
Planeamento Do Trabalho</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το LO βοηθά πώς το Συμβούλιο της ΕΕ 
εργάζεται. Αποτελείται από 10 πολλαπλής επιλογής ερωτήσεις
on:1. Σημασία του Συμβουλίου EU2. Μήκος 
Presidency3. Το Συμβούλιο meetings4. Σχέση μεταξύ
του Συμβουλίου της ΕΕ και ευρωπαϊκού Parliament5. 
Τροποποίηση treaties6. Αριθμός ψηφοφοριών που 
αποδίδονται σε countries7. Percentages8. Αριθμός 
του χυτού votes9. Ψηφοφορία mechanism10. 
Προγραμματισμός εργασίας</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este ayudas BAJAS que enseñan cómo el consejo del EU 
trabaja. Se compone de 10 preguntas on:1 de la 
mu'ltiple-opcio'n. Importancia del consejo del EU2. 
Longitud de Presidency3. Consejo meetings4. Lazo 
entre el consejo del EU y Parliament5 europeo. Enmendar 
treaties6. Número de los votos atribuidos a countries7. 
Percentages8. Número de votes9 echado. Mechanism10 
de votación. Hojas de operación (planning) Del Trabajo</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="it">Obiettivi di Istruzione Pedagogici: 
gli studenti ripasseranno il funzionamento del Consiglio dell'Unione Europea, oltre ad imparare i numeri basilari e le percentuali riguardanti questa istituzione fondamentale dell'Unione Europea. 
Gamma di età di approccio pedagogico:
14-25
Tempo concesso: 45 minuti.
Procedura: gli studenti possono lavorare individualmente, in coppia o in gruppi di 3 o 4. Scorrono tutte le domande che servono come fonte di informazione sul Consiglio dell'Unione Europea. Tale LO può essere usato da altri insegnanti in modi diversi a seconda della loro situazione di insegnamento, del loro obiettivo, gruppo di età, conoscenze pregresse, numero di studenti in classe, numero di computer nel laboratorio, tempo concesso, ecc.</string>
            <string language="en">Instructional and Pedagogical Objectives

Students will revise their knowledge on the way the Council of the EU works, also learning about the basic figures and percentages concerning this fundamental institution of the E.U.

Pedagogical Approach

Age range: 14-25
Timing - 45 minutes.
The procedure :
Students can work individually, in pairs or in groups of 3-4. They go through all the questions which serve as a source of information about the Council of the EU. This LO may be used by other teachers in many different ways depending on their teaching situation, their objective, age group, previous knowledge, number of students in the class, number of computers in the lab, given timing etc</string>
          </description>
        </educational>
